name: fastflix-monorepo
description: FastFlix - AI-powered movie and TV show recommendations

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../website && npm install
scripts.lint: concurrently -n front,back,web -c blue,green,yellow "npm run lint:frontend" "npm run lint:backend" "npm run lint:website"
scripts.typecheck: concurrently -n front,back,web -c blue,green,yellow "npm run typecheck:frontend" "npm run typecheck:backend" "npm run typecheck:website"
scripts.test: concurrently -n front,back -c blue,green "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:backend"
scripts.format:check: concurrently -n front,back,web -c blue,green,yellow "npm run format:check:frontend" "npm run format:check:backend" "npm run format:check:website"
scripts.format: concurrently -n front,back,web -c blue,green,yellow "npm run format:frontend" "npm run format:backend" "npm run format:website"
scripts.check-all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run format:check && npm run test
